summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2663, for the improvement of the ten foot alley extending from East Howell Street to East Denny Way, running back and between block 52, Yesler's 2nd Supplemental Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, by paving with asphalt, under Ordinance No. 31305 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
